thag4.3:1.2: that we need restraint in this.
thag4.3:1.3: But those who do understand this,
thag4.3:2.1: And when those who don’t understand
thag4.3:2.2: behave as though they were immortal,
thag4.3:2.4: are like the healthy among the sick.
thag4.3:4.3: is as far from true Dhamma
thag4.3:4.4: as the sky from the earth.
